Mark Kelson said,` If you can see me, give us the thumbs up.' Instead of giving us the thumbs up, she literally raises her whole arm.`` Then she starts reaching out and starts grabbing Mark Kelson , and like is touching him, and starts to nearly choke him. She is clearly trying to hug him. It was such a moment, and we were in such tears of joy watching this. Kirsten Gillibrand said that Gabrielle Giffords started to reach out and touch her husband's ring, his watch and his wrist. He said the electorate was expecting that focus when Barack Obama assumed office. I think he's working very hard on the issue of unemployment, which I think is the major problem facing American right now, and I think, and I hope, this will be the centerpiece of the State of the Union speech, Colin Powell told CNN Chief Political Correspondent Candy Crowley .`` We didn't elect` Superman,' we elected a human being.''
